Aaron Weinberg

Hi, I'm Aaron. I'm an Engineer, Developer,
Adventurer & Tinkerer

About Me

I grew up on a lake in the hills of western New York.
This is Where my passion for the outdoors began.
Now I'm an avid snowboarder, hiker, sailor and adventurer.

All my life I have been a tinkerer.
From building tree houses and a backyard snowmachine
To a homemade splitboard and speaker system.
While trying to understand the world and solve every day problems,
I realized that engineering was the right path for me.

Along the way my interest in computer science quickly deepened.
An immursive course in Web Development gave me the skills to get started.

As I've been torn between hardware, software, and mechanical engineering.
I'm now attending Case Western Reserve University.

I'm looking for Reasearch projects

And excepting Freelance Development opportunities.
